question: Bhavani Devi is associated with which sport?
explanation:
India Fencing champion Bhavani Devi has qualified for the Tokyo Olympics to be held this year. She became the first Indian fencer to be qualified for the Olympics. She has been selected by Adjusted Official Ranking (AOR) Method.
The Tokyo Olympics that were to happen in 2020 have been postponed to July 2021 owing to COVID pandemic.
